kw.name: Go To SKY App Login Page
Set Appium Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout in seconds used by various keywords.

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/server-args.md | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias |

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that element identified with locator is visible.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.arg: Para utilizar o app, primeiro informe os dados do assinante SKY.
kw.doc: Verifies element identified by ``locator`` exactly contains text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'id=br.com.sky.selfcare:id/2131429282' contains exactly text 'Para utilizar o app, primeiro informe os dados do assinante SKY.'.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that element identified with locator is visible.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.arg: CPF ou CNPJ do assinante SKY
kw.doc: Verifies element identified by ``locator`` exactly contains text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'id=br.com.sky.selfcare:id/2131431094' contains exactly text 'CPF ou CNPJ do assinante SKY'.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that element identified with locator is visible.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies element identified by ``locator`` exactly contains text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'id=br.com.sky.selfcare:id/2131428587' contains exactly text 'Digite seu CPF/CNPJ'.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that element identified with locator is visible.

kw.name: Element Attribute Should Match
kw.doc: Verify that an attribute of an element matches the expected criteria.
kw.msg: CAUTION: 'id=br.com.sky.selfcare:id/2131427871' matched 2 elements - using the first element only

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible

test.name: Test The Login Page With Invalid CPF

kw.name: Inform This CPF Into The Field
Input Value
kw.doc: Sets the given value into text field identified by `locator`. This is an IOS only keyword, input value makes use of set_value

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Hide Keyboard
kw.doc: Hides the software keyboard on the device. (optional) In iOS, use `key_name` to press a particular key, ex. `Done`. In Android, no parameters are used.

kw.name: Check If The App Informs That The CPF Is Invalid
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies element identified by ``locator`` exactly contains text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'id=br.com.sky.selfcare:id/2131428695' contains exactly text 'CPF inválido. Digite novamente.'.

kw.name: Element Attribute Should Match
kw.doc: Verify that an attribute of an element matches the expected criteria.
kw.msg: CAUTION: 'id=br.com.sky.selfcare:id/2131427871' matched 2 elements - using the first element only

kw.name: Close Application
kw.doc: Closes the current application and also close webdriver session.
